results.title: Cinco anos
results.creator_credit: Angela Barnett and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description: Accompanied by a soundtrack of vibrant Spanish music, this animated short contains a montage of multi-layered colourful images using hand-drawn animation, newspaper cuttings and stills to convey a sense of location and environment.

results.title: A Monster's Voyage
results.creator_credit: Morag Porteous, Jeremy Parker and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A young girl and her loyal friend are on a voyage together. While they are self-sufficient and happy, nothing can stay the same forever. This artistically creative short animation expresses emotion and feeling in its story-telling and has a mythical quality of legends and folklore. Use of strong colours and hand-drawn animation.
Created as part of coursework at the Centre for Animation and Interactive Media (AIM), RMIT, 2005.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Morag Porteous, Jeremy Parker and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT

results.title: The Quiet family
results.creator_credit: Mari Kim and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description: This 2D tale of horror has an unexpected twist to it - all is not what it seems! An Addams type of family deals with the consequences of having their little darling make friends with the rest of the world. Mainly b&w with splashes of colour. Hand-drawn animation.
